name: Miguel Vieira
body:
### SUMMARY
Software Engineer with expertise in designing, developing, and deploying Web based projects, analysing and modelling humanities and unstructured data, natural language processing, machine learning, and systems administration.

Over ten years experience developing in Python, Java and XSLT; over five years experience with Django; knowledge of several metadata standards, including TEI, Epidoc, METS, EAD; experience in several Apache projects: Ant, Cocoon, Lucene, Solr, Tomcat and Jetty; also designing, implementing and integrating databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite), and ontologies (RDF/OWL).

### EXPERIENCE
#### Software Engineer
*[King's Digital Lab](https://kdl.kcl.ac.uk), King’s College London*, 2015 to Present

#### Head of Research Development & Delivery
*[Department of Digital Humanities](http://www.kcl.ac.uk/artshums/depts/ddh/index.aspx), King’s College London*, 2012 – 2015

#### Research Fellow
*[Department of Digital Humanities](http://www.kcl.ac.uk/artshums/depts/ddh/index.aspx), King’s College London*, 2006 – 2012

#### Project Engineer
*[Critical Software](http://www.criticalsoftware.com/)*, 2005 – 2006

#### Software Developer
*[BookMARC](bookmarc.pt)*, 2001 – 2005

### CERTIFICATIONS
Coursera — Machine Learning, 2013

### EDUCATION
[Universidade de Coimbra](http://www.uc.pt/en/fctuc/dei), Coimbra, Portugal — BSc Computer Science, 2001

[Instituto Superior de Engenharia de Coimbra](http://www.isec.pt), Coimbra, Portugal — BSc Informatics and Systems Engineering, 1998

### SKILLS
Python (Django, iPython, NLTK, Pandas), Java, Octave; HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery,  d3js, CSS, SASS, Foundation; Subversion, Mercurial, Git; XML, XSLT, XSD, RNG; Apache Cocoon, Apache Lucene, Apache Solr, ElasticSearch; Apache Tomcat, Apache Ant; RDF/OWL, Protégé; SQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, eXist DB, Redis; Linux administration; Agile methodologies.
